document_data.name: Robe of Stars
document_data.mainbody: A '''''robe of stars''''' was a [[magical]] robe that offered a [[spellcaster]] significant physical protection along with a variety of other [[magic]]al powers.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1715}}
document_data.Description: These robes were often woven with dark blue or black fabric and decorated with embroidery of silvery stars or ''[[rune]]s''.
